title: Is there a teacher in Dallas who makes $90,000 in his third year?
text: Texas legislators are considering various ways of increasing teachers ' wages during this year ' s legislative cycle and are discussing proposals that include comprehensive increases and merit-based increases for senior teachers. Raising the teacher ' s salary is a priority for the Government. Greg Abbott, who discussed the initiative during his State Status Address in February. He said that the incentive payment programme at a school in Texas had created a six-digit payout for active teachers. "When I visited Planton Primary School in Dallas, I met a distinguished teacher who was only in his third year of teaching. We were curious about Abbott's payroll, could a third-year teacher be close to six digits? It is true that experienced teachers in the Dallas school area can receive a base salary of $90,000, but it usually takes years to get there. Less experienced persons also reported rising revenues in the province - usually through a combination of salaries, rewards, performance-related rewards and other factors, such as language or teaching in schools with low academic performance for students. From Abbott ' s claim, the teacher did not respond to requests for further information about the teacher cited in his speech. Dallas school officials didn't mention the name of the teacher, but we found that he spoke to another media port and contacted him. Josu Tamares Torres, who teaches science and mathematics in fourth grade in the Dallas school district, said he thought he was the teacher mentioned in Abbott's speech. In the last academic year, Tamarez Torres was in the third year of the Planton elementary school, but in the eighth year of his education in the Dallas school district. While he earned more than $90,000 in the last school year, the base salary of Torres Tamarez was $82,000. But it takes years to get there. A teacher who has spent three years in the classroom can receive a basic salary of up to $74,000, according to the county salary scale. The junior teacher receives an initial salary of $50,000 a year. However, teachers can increase their compensation through rewards and incentives. One of the largest salary increases is the Accelerated Excellence Initiative on the campus in the province. The teacher can receive an annual salary of up to $12,000 for teaching in less performing schools, as stated by programme manager Shatara Stokes. Another three-year experienced teacher worked at the Planton Primary School last school year and received more than $90,000 between her base salary of $74,000, an accelerated university concession salary of $12,000 and a salary of $3,000 for bilingual teachers. It also receives US$ 3,692 in supplementary tuition and classroom supplies, according to the spokesman for Dallas Robin Harris County. Harris said that the county didn't think that the governor was referring to this teacher in his speech.
